articles.title: Pilots seek Indian government help to quit Go First - Reuters
articles.description: Pilots at India's Go First face delays getting paid due to the airline's bankruptcy process and want the government to allow them to take up new jobs without serving long notice periods, a group representing the pilots said in a letter seen by Reuters.
articles.content: May 15 (Reuters) - Pilots at India's Go First face delays getting paid due to the airline's bankruptcy process and want the government to allow them to take up new jobs without serving long notice pe… [+1963 chars]
